Texts.Text: Enter remote computer access auth code:
Enter remote computer access auth code:
Remote control time out and auto closed.\r\n This appears when you have more remote control PCs than the max. num that a free version supports.
Welcome to use XT800 Quick Support. Starting...
Type: Unknown Size: Unknown Date Modified: Unknown
You have more contacts than the free version supports.
Enter remote computer access auth code:
Welcome to use XT800, please login
User has logged out. \r\n Please login again.
Network outages, \r\n will auto re-login in %s...
Login timeout, \r\n will auto re-login in %s...
Registration error, \r\n will auto re-register in %s...
Login error, \r\n will auto re-login in %s...
has invited %s to control your PC, waiting for confirmation...
has been certified, is trying to connect...
without a valid license or license has expired, please contact your service provider
This account is not allowed to log on at this computer. Contact your service provider.
Network unavailable. Make sure the network is available.
Current account logged on in another computer.
Setting file error. Re-install the software.
Network initialization error (-1). Try to restart the software.
Network initialization error (-2). Try to restart the software.
Network initialization error (-3). Try to restart the software.
Network initialization error (0). Try to restart the software.
Network initialization error (1). Check the network connection.
%s is accessing your computer. Press Ctrl + Alt + Esc to close the current connection.
Control the other computer via an authorization code
View the other computer via an authorization code
Invite the other to control my computer
Allow others to control my computer
No answer. Request is auto canceled. Please try again later.
Invite for remote control? Please confirm.
Already in remote connection. Upgrade to VIP for multi-point simultaneous remote connection.
Windows session is interrupted, please retry later.
Already in remote connection. Request the other to upgrade to VIP for multi-point simultaneous remote connection.
The other’s computer is in Windows remote desktop connection %s. Log off and disconnect it and try XT800 for remote control.
No valid remote desktop session. Remote control session has ended. Try again.
Remote Windows desktop session is disconnected. Remote control session has ended. Try again.
Remote control session has ended as another user has connected to this computer via Windows remote desktop. Your connection has been lost. Try to connect again.
Remote control connection timeout and is auto closed. \r\n As you have more remote control PCs than the Num the free version supports.

这是由协之通XT800提供的免费远程控制。
只能用于非商业用途。
想要体验快速、无限制的远程控制，请升级为VIP。
 
感谢您的支持！
Idle time too long, remote disconnected
Press Enter to send the message
Has transferred request of %s|%s|%s|%s| to %s, waiting for confirmation...
%s(%s) has transferred request of %s|%s|%s|%s| to you, please %s|%s|%s|accept|, or %s|%s|%s|deny|.
Agent %s|%s|%s|%s| will be at your service. Click %s|%s|%s|here| to request for help
%s has accepted service transfer request for %s|%s|%s|%s|.
Hello, %s|%s|%s|%s| has transferred your request to me. I am at your service.
%s has accepted service transfer request for %s|%s|%s|%s|.
screenshot program is missing, unable to complete screenshot, please re-install the software.
Enter the account you want to connect.
Can not be self operated remotely.
No "Authorized User" selected or no "Unauthorized User Access Code" set, and thus no user may access this shared folder.
Your nickname is too long. Do not exceed 30 words.
No "Authorized User" selected and thus no user may connect remotely to this computer.
Inconsistent auth codes. Please try again
Private auth codes can not be empty
Private auth codes can not be less than 6 characters
Private auth code can not exceed 24 characters
XT program in remote PC is too low. It does not support remote shutdown. Needs to upgrade to the latest version.
XT program in remote PC is too low. It does not support remote reboot. Needs to upgrade to the latest version.
XT program in remote PC is too low. It does not support remote process termination. Needs to upgrade to the latest version.
Reached limit for free version, unable to bind to corpation.
Are you sure you want to clear the history?
Already sent request for adding contact
You have not set the unlock password. Click OK to set.
A shared folder with the same name already exists. Please use another share name.
This folder has been shared. Please choose another folder.
Are you sure you want to delete the file "%s"?
You sure you want to delete the folder "%s" and all contents in it?
Unable to delete "%s" as file is being used by another person or program. %s close all programs using this file and try again
An error occurred while deflecting the file or folder
Unable to rename "%s" as file is being used by another person or program. %s close all programs using this file and try again
An error occurred while renaming the file or foler

Hello, 
 please download and start remote helper XT800 free version: 
http://www.xt800.cn/download/latest?t=p&l=c

----
www.xt800.cn
Welcome to use XT800 remote services...
The contact already exists in the blacklist.
The contact already exists in the whitelist.
Enter the PC num you want to add:
Enter the account you want to add:
Enter the correct PC num (not username)!
Can not add as it is already in your list!
Can not add as it is already your contact!
Can not add as the user is in your blacklist!
You can not add yourself as a contact!
You have more contacts than that free version supports. Upgrade to VIP for unlimited num of contacts.
File is locked and can not be read. Close the relevant program and try again.
Can not add the same task as it is already in the queue
Select the folder you want to send
Are you sure you want to add the contact to blacklist?
No auth to initiate satisfaction survey.
Can not turn off Windows!(Error Code:%d)
Critical program module is lost. Initiated request failed!"
Note names can not exceed 32 characters.
Enter a valid username and password
Switch to busy when in remote control
Switch to busy when in text conversation
Your PC is under remote control of %s. \r\n Click to interrupt remote control.
Your PC is under remote control of %s(%s) \r\n Click to interrupt remote control.
Your PC is under remote control by multiple users. \r\n Click to disconnect all.
Enter username and password for binding.
Cancel the binding and exit the program?
Cancel the binding and exit the program? \r\n Current account will be remembered and auto log in next time it is started.
Get upgrade info, click to upgrade
Remote server module network initialization failed (Code% d). Check the network configuration.
APP locked, enter the unlock code:
%s(%s) has added you as a contact.
%s has added you as a contact.
Add failed. Your add operation is too frequent.
Add failed. You have exceeded the max. contact limit.
Add failed. The contact you want to add does not exist.
Add failed for an unknown reason.
Remote PC is locked and can not accept the invitation
Need to disconnect the control of remote PC?
Time limit is reached. It will be auto closed
Channel auth limit has been reached. Only %s left
Network error. Try to connect using relay...
Network error. Try to connect using TCP...
User client is not online. Remote control request failed!
%s invites you to remotely control its PC. Accept?
%s(%s)invites you to remotely control its PC. Accept?
%s requests remote control of your computer. Accept?
%s(%s) requests remote control of your computer. Accept?
Unable to rename "%s" as there may be a file being used. \r\n Close any program that may be using this file and try again
An error occurred while renaming file or folder
File with same name already exists in remote PC. Overwrite it?
Use is offline. File management window will be closed.
Not an executable file. Can not be executed remotely!
Auth code verification failed. Click OK to exit remote file management window and re-verify auth code.
Can not rename the file or folder as it does not exist. Click "OK" to refresh the directory.
Can not rename the file or folder as it may be used by other applications.
Auto code verification failed. Click OK to exit remote file management window and re-verify.
Can not execute the file as it does not exist. Click "OK" to refresh the directory.
Do not have permission to execute the command.
Auto code verification failed. Click OK to exit remote file management window and re-verify.
Can not rename the file or folder as it does not exist. Click "OK" to refresh the directory.
Can not delete the file or folder as it may be used by other programs.
Auto code verification failed. Click OK to exit remote file management window and re-verify.
Can not create a new folder as the current path does not exist. Click "OK" to go back to the parent directory!
Can not create a new folder as the current path does not exist. Click "OK" to go back to the parent directory!
Auto code verification failed. Click OK to exit remote file management window and re-verify.
Folder directory info can not be obtained as the path does not exist!
Folder directory info can not be obtained as the path does not exist!
%s is remotely managing files in your PC.
%s(%s) is remotely managing files in your PC.
%s requests to manage your files. Accept?
%s is remotely managing files in your PC.
Can not use this string as a password. Please choose another string.
Has received new settings. Need to close the current window to update the settings.
Settings - Enabled automatic synchronization of settings. Some options can not be changed. Please contact your service personnel.
Status: Connection failed, please check your network settings
Setting password can not be less than 6 characters.
Setting password can not be more than 32 characters.
Unlock password can not be less than 6 characters.
Unlock password can not be more than 32 characters.
Enter valid proxy server authentication info.
Binding corporate services. Close the window after binding!
Corporate binding succeeded.\r\nClick the Close button to close the window.
Unbinding succeeded.\r\nClick the Close button to close the window.
Software settings locked. Enter the unlock code to unlock.
An error occurred, failed to properly set up! Probably corresponding service is not installed correctly.
An error occurred, failed to install service!
Enter authentication info of proxy server %s. Click OK if authentication is not required.
Settings will take affect after application restart
Delete chat history of %s? Please confirm.
You are already using the latest version
XT800 is downloading upgrade program. Please wait...
XT800 is downloading upgrade program. Please wait... %s/%s
XT800 is downloading upgrade program. Downloaded %2.2f%%
Download failed. Please try again later.
Update checking succeeded. Upgrade will soon be started...
Update checking failed. Please contact Agent.
Stop update downloading before you close the window.
Mandatory upgrade will begin in 30 sec.
Update download will begin in 30 sec.
XT800 needs to be upgraded, waiting for confirmation...
Update downloading. Update will start after download is completed.
XT800 needs to be upgraded. Download will begin in 30 sec.
Update download will start in %d sec...

%s is viewing your computer's software installation list

%s is viewing your computer's list of services
%s is viewing your computer's application events
%s is viewing your computer's security events
%s is viewing your computer's system events

Run in tray mode after startup (not displayed in main interface)

Setting lock to prevent software exit
% users in the contacts do not need to confirm
Auto delete all chat records when exits KDT
Allow only users in the contact list to send me messages and connection requests.

Edit auto responder contents. The program will auto reply in the locked state (240 bytes or less)

Software locked. Enter the unlock code:
Mandatory TCP for data transfer (only in case of network error)]
Blacklist users will not be able to view your online status or send you any info or connection request.
Close the following message notify box to keep the program is silent:
Turn off remote file management notify.
Auto delete all chat logs when exit the program.
Turn off remote process status query notify.
Turn off remote computer online notify.
Whitelist users will be able to access and control your computer.

You are currently using windows remote desktop. XT800 has started setting mode.
Please record the following account info and set your auth code.
Enter your deployment code. Contact technical support company to obtain
Corporate binding being canceled, please wait...
XT800 detected a new version available. It is recommended that you upgrade:
XT800 is downloading the upgrade program
XT800 upgrade program is being downloaded, please wait...
Please enter a remark name (32 words or less):
Auto detect screen update.(Improve screen refresh, required high bandwidth)
Software simulate Ctrl + Alt + Del combination.(For VISTA and above)
Allow host to shield current computer screen.(For Windows 2003 and XP)
Remove desktop background under remote control
Remove Areo effect under remote control (For VISTA and above)
Do not show window contents when dragging the window
Quick mode (low CPU utilization, but high bandwidth consumption)
Select this option to avoid cursor flicker when local computer is being monitored, but the host does not show translucent window in remote viewer.
Do not intercept remote machine’s translucent window
Enable local frame cache (may effectively save bandwidth, but may cause blurred screen)]
Enable picture data compression (the greater the value is the more to save bandwidth, but CPU occupation will increase)
Image picture quality (the larger the value is the higher the image quality but bandwidth consumption will increase)
Using picture compression (only for Tight coding)
Using JPEG image compression (only for Tight coding)
XT800 remote service component not installed or started and unable to accept your current request.
You may send the following text to the other side:
You are trying to remotely execute the application. Enter execution parameters (optional):
Set your support company info follows:
Contact your remote technical support company to obtain deploy code.
May get quick help and remote supports after binding deploy code.
Generally you may use a proxy server. You need to enter the correct info in the Options dialog box.
Please enter the proxy server auth info. Directly click OK if auto is not needed.
Select customer access in the list for service
Enter contact ID you want to add:
XT800 is downloading the upgrade program
Remind the other side to install and start the component
